snippet: When the outfield dimensions shrunk, it became difficult to see the numbers in left field. They are now displayed at the top of the stadium....
abstract: New York Mets have moved display of retired numbers to top of Citi Field from left-field wall to improve their visibility after renovation.
lead_paragraph: When the outfield dimensions shrunk, it became difficult to see the numbers in left field. They are now displayed at the top of the stadium.

headline.main: New Geometry of Citi Field Puts Mets’ Retired Numbers on the Move
